```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(troopdata)
```


```{r}
bases <- get_basedata()

# Some of the bases include unexpected characters which we need to address
Encoding(bases$basename) <- "latin1"

leaflet(data = bases) %>% 
  addTiles() %>%  #Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(
    lng = bases$lon,
    lat = bases$lat,
    popup = bases$basename,
    label = bases$countryname
  )
```
